column4: i think my sound card is working but the volume control doesnt do jack
type alsamixer into a terminal
drag and drop them, if that doesn't work, import them
sometimes to get gnome-appearence to see that anything was installed Ive got to close the the window then reopen it. its the same with emerald.
do this System Appearence Advanced Settings tab and see which bullet is lit up.
just the regular gnome system appearence dialog
unless your using KDE...
see it?
ok thats the one
whats it say?
thats whats controlling your compiz effects
turn it too off then use fusion0icon to control it/them
gnome is not fusion icon
yes there is right click on the icon in the task tray
goto System > Preferences > Sessions
in sessions you should have a entry for compiz-fusion-icon in there in the startup tab
if you don't add one then logout and back in
it should give you the option to add one. look for new or file new or something.
Im in fluxbox and therefor don't have the menu in front of me
are you in Sessions > Start-up?
just type > compiz-fusion-icon < into the command box
